data.text: @TheWrap Time.  People thought Mel Gibson would never recover and he was nominsted for an Oscar. Today was a mistake however.
@TheWrap It's over. If there is any semblance of recovery it will be on a minute scale. At least for the next 4-8 years #kathyGriffin
@TheWrap How about leave her alone already? Her career is only over if the media continue to do everything they can to grind her into dust.
